column4: Can someone help me with a question on whether I should live boot ubuntu or knoppix?
sorry new at this don't know how to work the irc.

I'm trying to get >4gb files off my mac. I was thinking of using ubuntu 11.10 as a live boot without installing. I remembered I used to do this with knoppix and it worked.  I want to write to NTFS drives from the Linux Live OS.  Is ubuntu going to have full capability?
